message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $7000 and you receive $3000. I believe this division is fair given that delaying the deal further could diminish our returns—especially on my side due to inflation. Let’s settle now and avoid any unnecessary complications!
Hi Alice, considering the inflation impact, I propose a more balanced division. I believe we should share the risk more equally to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Hi Bob, I accept your proposal. Given the inflation impact on my share, your offer of $4500 (worth 20% less due to inflation) provides me with an effective value that is better than what I would likely secure by delaying further and proposing in the next round. Let's settle this agreement now.
